price: Ó tún wà nínú wọn, ẹni tí ń bú ọ níbi (pípín) àwọn ọrẹ. Tí A bá fún wọn nínú rẹ̀, wọ́n á yọ́nú (sí i). Tí A ò bá sì fún wọn nínú rẹ̀, nígbà náà ni wọn yóò máa bínú.
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَلۡمِزُكَ فِي ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِ فَإِنۡ أُعۡطُواْ مِنۡهَا رَضُواْ وَإِن لَّمۡ يُعۡطَوۡاْ مِنۡهَآ إِذَا هُمۡ يَسۡخَطُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yalmizuka fī al-ṣadaqāti fa-in uʿ'ṭū min'hā raḍū wa-in lam yuʿ'ṭaw min'hā idhā hum yaskhaṭūna
